title: Imagine Dragons, Apple team up on charity single for refugees
text:
Imagine Dragons, Apple team up on charity single for refugees 
Published By: MacNN.com - Today 
As the ongoing refugee crisis as a result of the Syrian civil war continues to flood Europe with migrants, Apple has opted to step up relief...
